content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":95228,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2550d12d-c467-4607-ac08-b4a19ccbe282/5_fix.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2550d12d-c467-4607-ac08-b4a19ccbe282/5_fix.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"5_fix.png\",\"name\":\"5_fix.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"2550d12d-c467-4607-ac08-b4a19ccbe282\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":246.17224880382776},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM and our Competency Center are growing fast, and we need to conduct more and more\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Interview\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" interviews\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to hire new team members. That's why we are always in need of people who are willing to handle the entry\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" interviews\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have prior interviewing experience and are eager to join interviewers' community, you can learn \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/TI/I%27m+an+Interviewer\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"information about EPAM Technical Interview Service\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/TI/Become+a+Certified+Technical+Interviewer\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" become certified interviewer\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Recruiters will get in touch with you soon, and you will be able to participate in interviews not only in your location but also in other places, including the new European offices. This is a perfect opportunity to network with your future coworkers from other locations, improve your English, and make yourself known on a global level at EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you don't have such an experience yet, but wish to join the EPAM interviewing team, request joining \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://teams.microsoft.com/l/channel/19%3a6b74fb41a4834e91bef9f2be3c2422fd%40thread.tacv2/JavaScript?groupId=d84c4fdb-3cda-402f-9506-0cf0c41a407e&tenantId=b41b72d0-4e9f-4c26-8a69-f949f367c91d\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TI Co-pilot channel\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You'll be assigned a mentor and start interviewing together. The mentor will provide feedback, and soon you'll become a real interviewer and possibly someone else's mentor.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
